Package gov.anl.ipns.Util.File

Interface Summary
IXmlIO Interface for objects that can read and write themselves in XML format to byte streams.
 

Class Summary
RobustFileFilter This class adds additional functionality to Java's FileFilter In addition to completing the methods that are abstract in FileFilter, it adds the capabilities to automatically ensure that the desired extension is put on the file name, as well as adding several other convenience methods.
SerializeUtil Utility class for reading and writing generic Objects from and to a File.
TextFileReader This class supports reading of Strings, floats, ints etc.
xml_utils Provides utilities for reading through sections of an xml file representing a DataSet sequentially
